gallery.title: Creations Gallery
gallery.subtitle: Explore Our Unique Creations
gallery.description: Discover how our creations come to life in fashion editorials and international runways. Each piece tells a story of elegance and artisanal sophistication.
gallery.inMediaDescription: Our creations have been featured in major fashion magazines and international runway shows in Montreal, proving that artisanal crochet can compete in the highest spheres of contemporary fashion.

process.title: Our Artisanal Process
process.subtitle: From Inspiration to Creation
process.description: Each piece I create is the result of a careful process that honors the ancestral traditions of weaving, combining ancient techniques with my contemporary creativity.

step1.title: Material Selection
step1.description: We carefully select high-quality yarns to ensure durability and comfort

step2.title: Design and Planning
step2.description: Each piece is designed with attention to detail and unique style

step3.title: Handmade Creation
step3.description: Handcrafted using traditional crochet and knitting techniques

step4.title: Quality Control
step4.description: Each creation is inspected to ensure perfection before delivery

process.qualityDescription: Each piece goes through my rigorous quality control. I review every stitch, every detail, ensuring that each creation reflects the excellence and love I put into my work.

about.title: About YariCrochetFina
about.subtitle: The Art of Handmade Crochet
about.description: Welcome to my world of unique crochet and knit creations. I'm Yaritza Salgado Fina, a passionate artisan who transforms every thread into wearable art. Each piece I create tells a story, blending ancestral techniques with contemporary design.
about.passion: My passion for crochet began years ago and has become my true calling. Each creation results from countless hours of meticulous work, love for the craft, and unwavering commitment to quality.
about.quality: I'm committed to using only premium materials and maintaining the highest craftsmanship standards. Each piece is unique and made with love, especially for you.
about.artisanTitle: Artisan at Heart, Creator of Dreams
about.paragraph1: Since childhood, I found in weaving not just a passion, but a way to connect with family traditions passed down through generations. With over 15 years of experience, I've perfected ancestral techniques that seemed to be lost in time.
about.paragraph2: My mission goes beyond creating beautiful crochet and knit pieces: I seek to revive the value of artisanal work in an era where handmade items are becoming increasingly precious and meaningful.
about.paragraph3: Each of my creations reflects not only technical skill, but also creativity, imagination, and manual dexterity - that ability that only comes with years of dedication and love for my craft.

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: Valuing manual work and local shopping

promise.title: Promise
promise.description: Every piece tells a unique story

about.quote: In every stitch there is a heartbeat, in every creation there is a soul. This is more than crochet, it's art that embraces.

testimonials.title: What Our Customers Say
testimonials.subtitle: Authentic Reviews
testimonials.description: Each testimonial is a story of satisfaction, a smile woven into words. These are the voices of those who have found something special in our creations.

footer.description: Dedicated to reviving ancestral crochet techniques, we create unique pieces that tell stories and embrace traditions. Each stitch is a heartbeat, each creation is a soul.

maria.message: Yaritza's pieces are simply extraordinary. The quality of the weaving and attention to detail are unmatched.

ana.message: I love the vintage style of her creations. Every time I wear a YariCrochetFina piece, I receive many compliments.

carmen.message: The passion for ancestral techniques shows in every stitch. Unique products that tell a story.
